title: ngGirls @ Copenhagen
announcement:
We are excited to announce ngGirls workshop in Copenhagen on March 8th, 2026 - International Women's Day! ðŸŽ‰

This free, one-day workshop is designed to introduce women to the world of web development with Angular. Whether you're a complete beginner or have some coding experience, this workshop will help you build your first Angular application in a friendly and supportive environment.

Join us for a day of learning, coding, and networking with fellow participants and experienced mentors from the Angular community.

What to expect:

  • Hands-on Angular development workshop
  • Expert mentors to guide you through the tutorial
  • Networking opportunities with other participants
  • Free lunch and refreshments
  • A supportive and inclusive environment

Application forms will be available soon. Stay tuned!
